page.title: 16Clubs & Recreation:Gringley
page.content: {TENNIS}:one court at Finkell St. playing fields;Sunday is Club day; members aged 16+.{ FOOTBALL "Gringley Celtic" - players from Gringley,Misterton & Walkeringham; staff & inmates of Detention Centre also have a team.{YOUTH CLUB}:began in 1980;members aged 11-18yrs;membership: 50p;entrance fee 20p;monthly disco; occasional visits to Sheffield - ice- skating;5 day boat-trip in summer; table tennis,snooker,pool;Fridays 7:30-9:30pm in Village Hall.{O.A.P.s} :6 cttee.ladies organise bingo,whist drives,trips to Yorks.Dales & Derbys. {LADIES LIONS}:Wives of 'North Notts. Lions' meet occasionally in Gringley; "Lions":international fund-raising organisation.{W.I.}:begun in 1947;21 members;monthly meetings in Village Hall.{P.T.A.}:began c.11 yrs ago;staff & 6 parents meet 1/2 times each term.
